titleInfo.title: Topological Structures around the Thermal Phase-Transition of Pure SU(3) Gauge-Theory Studied on a Quadrics Q16

name.namePart: XIIth International Symposium on Lattice Field Theory (LATTICE 94)

mods.abstract: The temperature dependence of the topological susceptibility around and above the deconfining phase transition is studied both by cooling and the field theoretic method. The susceptibility has a peak at T similar or equal to 0.83T(c) and drops steeply at T-c. In the cooled configurations a characteristic anisotropy of the correlation function of topological charge is detected in the range T approximate to (1.2)T-c.

Topological Structures around the Thermal Phase-Transition of Pure SU(3) Gauge-Theory Studied on a Quadrics Q16.
Presented at the XIIth International Symposium on Lattice Field Theory (LATTICE 94), Bielefeld, Germany.
